description: Phase 2 Manual Quality Evaluation - 6 Provider Comparison

test_document.type: International arbitration case (Famas GmbH vs Elcomponics Sales)
test_document.rationale: Real legal document with multiple events, dates, citations - ideal for quality comparison

evaluation_criteria.completeness: Are all legal events from the document extracted? (0-10)
evaluation_criteria.accuracy: Are dates, parties, and facts correct? (0-10)
evaluation_criteria.hallucinations: Are there invented facts or citations? (0=many, 10=none)
evaluation_criteria.citation_quality: Are legal citations accurate and properly formatted? (0-10)

champion_categories: Quality Champion: Best overall extraction quality
methodology: Manual processing via Streamlit UI, export to Excel, human review by legal criteria, cost/speed analysis from logs
